text: Amos Lin (2 July 1933 – 21 September 2020) was an Israeli basketball player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1952 Summer Olympics. Lin died on 21 September 2020, at the age of 87.כדורסלן העבר עמוס לין הלך לעולמו ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Israeli basketball players Category:Olympians for Israel
title: Amos Lin
